org.springframework.web.server.session

接口 ConfigurableWebSession

  • 所有超级接口:
    WebSession
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultWebSession

    public interface ConfigurableWebSession
extends WebSession
    Extend WebSession with management operations meant for internal use for example by implementations of WebSessionManager.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setLastAccessTime(Instant time)
      Update the last access time for user-related session activity.
      void setSaveOperation(Supplier<reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void>> saveOperation)
      Set the operation to invoke when WebSession.save() is invoked.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.web.server.WebSession

        getAttribute, getAttributes, getCreationTime, getId, getLastAccessTime, getMaxIdleTime, isExpired, isStarted, save, setMaxIdleTime, start

    • 方法详细资料

      • setLastAccessTime

        void setLastAccessTime(Instant time)
        Update the last access time for user-related session activity.
        参数:
        time - the time of access

      • setSaveOperation

        void setSaveOperation(Supplier<reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void>> saveOperation)
        Set the operation to invoke when WebSession.save() is invoked.
        参数:
        saveOperation - the save operation
